messages.title: Jo Swinson's Plan for Britain's Future
messages.content: Stop Brexit, tackle the climate emergency, give every child the best start in life, build a fair economy, transform our mental health service.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit to build a brighter future.
Cut NHS waiting times, tackle the climate emergency, drive up performance in our schools.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give every child the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers and increase starting salaries for teachers.
Transform our mental health service by treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit to build a brighter future.
issues.education: Recruit 20,000 more teachers and increase starting salaries.
issues.health: Cut NHS waiting times, Transform our mental health service.

community.content: Recruit 20,000 more teachers and increase starting salaries.

endorsements.endorsement: "I have been impressed over the past year by the stellar performance from Jo Swinson and her team on Brexit and other issues."

endorsements.endorser: Tanja Bueltmann, Former Liberal Democrat Employee
endorsements.endorsement: "The party’s strong principles in the national interest give me hope."

images.caption: Join the Liberal Democrats to build a brighter future.
